summary: Easily convert xwm wav and mp3 files
descriptionHtml:
ConvertX2W v1.1 by CloudD901

ConvertX2W was meant to be used as a GUI for \'xWMAEncode.exe\' and \'lame.exe\'. Designed to convert audio files for Skyrim.

I downloaded my copy of \'xWMAEncode.exe\' here:
http://www.2shared.com/file/EjB1SM1Q/xWMAEncode.html

I downloaded my copy of \'lame.exe\' here:
http://www.rarewares.org/files/mp3/lame3.99.5.zip

Select the Encoders on startup and the rest is simple enough.
Point the program to a directory or file and choose what file type you need it converted to.


Version 1.1
    Fixed conversion from mp3 to xwm. 
Version 1.0
    Initial release.
author: CloudD901

files.name: ConvertX2W
files.changelogHtml: Fixed conversion from mp3 to xwm.
